title: Login with Valid Credentials
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter valid username and password.
3. Click submit.
4. Verify user is redirected to dashboard.

title: Login with Invalid Password
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the login page.
2. Enter valid username and invalid password.
3. Click submit.
4. Verify 'Invalid Credentials' error is displayed.

title: Checkout - Invalid Payment Info
custom_steps:
1. Add item to cart.
2. Provide invalid credit card number.
3. Click 'Pay'.
4. Verify payment error message is shown.

title: Checkout - Valid Payment Info
custom_steps:
1. Add item to cart.
2. Provide valid credit card details.
3. Click 'Pay'.
4. Verify success message and order summary.

title: Profile Update - Missing Fields
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to Profile page.
2. Remove mandatory fields (e.g., email).
3. Click 'Save'.
4. Verify error message for required field.

title: API Orders Endpoint
custom_steps:
1. Send GET request to /api/orders.
2. Verify response status is 200.
3. Validate response payload.

title: Dashboard Load Performance
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Measure load time.
3. Verify all widgets load correctly within 2 seconds.

title: Notifications Service Availability
custom_steps:
1. Trigger a notification event.
2. Verify the notifications service is reachable.
3. Confirm receipt of the notification.

title: Search Feature Completeness
custom_steps:
1. Enter a search query in the search bar.
2. Submit the search.
3. Verify that all relevant results are returned and displayed correctly.

title: Reports CSV Export
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Reports section.
2. Select the desired report.
3. Click 'Export as CSV'.
4. Verify the CSV file is downloaded and data integrity is maintained.
